Description:
SOLD BY STEVE JUSUP & NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
Stockdale Leggo Real Estate proudly present another magnificent Metricon residence. The home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms with BIRs, the master with WIR and oversize shower ensuite. A sensational kitchen featuring stone benches, glass splashback and stainless steel appliances overlooks the dining and huge living area that spills out to the lovely alfresco area and large backyard space. Other features include kids retreat or second living area, ducted heating, stone benches in bathrooms, down lights, beautifully landscaped front and rear gardens and double remote garage with internal access. All this on a large allotment of approximately 512sqm in a quiet owner occupied pocket surrounded by other quality properties. Inspection highly recommended.
Insights: 49 Pembroke Crescent, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2014.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
Perfectly suited to the first home buyer looking to make their first step into the property market, downsizers wanting a great low maintenance home or for the investor an affordable entry level opportunity well under the suburb median price allowing room for plenty of future price growth and great returns. Masterfully designed the property comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 with access to a private decked courtyard, 2 superb bathrooms and an open plan kitchen, dining and huge living space that leads out to the lovely alfresco area and rear yard. Other features include soaring high ceilings, ducted heating, cooling, square set plastering, down lights, remote garage with internal access, bonus 2nd off street parking spot and landscaped front and rear gardens. All this combined with a great location only a few steps from schools, parks, ABC learning centre, transport, community centre and proposed new shops make this home a must see for any first home buyers, downsizers or investors.
Insights: 5A Amberley Gardens, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2014.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED CONTACT AGENT
Look No Further!
Located in the ever popular Derrimut, this magnificent 32 Square (approx) family home has everything to offer. At first glance the home will take your breath away with its lush open floor plan, generous living areas and entry. Make your way into the hub of the home where you will find a formal sitting room, a spacious kitchen boasting modern stainless steel appliances that will allow you plenty of room to cook for friends & family all the while overlooking the dining and family rooms. The alfresco area will make entertaining all year round a breeze. This family home offers 4 large bedrooms with built in robes, (Master with 2 walk around robes), central bathroom will cater for little ones while the master suite provides room for your own parents retreat and large en-suite with double shower. The home features many upgrades and offers unsurpassed quality in fixtures & fittings. Additional features of this home are double garage with internal access, alarm, refrigerated heating and cooling, soaring high ceilings all set on a generous sized block of 750m2 and much much more......
Close to all amenities such as train station, schools, shops and easy access to the Western Ring Road. Inspect today to avoid disappointment
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
Darren Lambert : 0404 542 361

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
Masterfully designed to incorporate vast and expansive indoor and outdoor living spaces complimented by extra oversized bedroom accommodation, this quality Burbank residence has been lovingly maintained and presents in pristine condition. At approximately 30 squares on a large 517sqm ( approx.) allotment this home is perfectly suited to those that require size and space, enjoy hosting large family gatherings or buyers that want to take advantage of the fantastic location being walking distance from Derrimut Village , schools, parkland , transport and the golf course. Providing a great family environment , the property also provides an opportunity to add value as with some very minor alterations the home can be easily converted into a 4 bedroom plus study residence whilst still retaining the 2 large living areas . Other features include ducted heating, 2 x split systems, alarm , stainless steel appliances, satellite dish, solar hot water, 5 star energy rated, double remote garage ( room to add roller door for rear access) and landscaped front and rear gardens. Please contact agent for an inspection.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED - CONTACT AGENT
Much loved from its inception, this beautiful Metricon home provided a great family environment for the owners for many years and for the last 8 months a super investment. Securely tenanted till Feb 10th 2015, an investor can purchase with the luxury of already having great tenants, or for those looking to owner occupy, the vendors are more than happy to accommodate a long settlement that coincides with the end of lease, providing the lucky purchaser with the added bonus of expected price growth prior to taking ownership as property prices in the suburb are on the rise. Comprising an open plan kitchen overlooking the expansive dining and main living space which spills out to the lovely paved outdoor entertaining area and large backyard. The sleeping quarters are highlighted by the enormous master suite with walk in robe and oversize shower ensuite with 2 additional bedrooms serviced by the main bathroom. With a huge BIR, the open study provides flexibility for buyers as it can easily be converted to 4th bedroom. Other features include a separate lounge room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry in kitchen, downlights, landscaped mature gardens with large storage shed and double remote garage with double driveway accommodating off street parking for 4 vehicles.
Insights: 5 Bateman Close, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2014.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
This fantastic Derrimut residence proves that the concept of entertaining in the GREAT AUSSIE BACKYARD is still very much alive and well. With extensive decking, feature walls, mature gardens , designated BBQ area with seating , fire pit, grassed area for the kids to play and extended alfresco with triple stacker doors this backyard is the complete package and an entertainers dream. Inside is just as impressive comprising master with retreat area , WIR and luxurious ensuite featuring double vanities, oversize shower and bath and 2 additional bedrooms with BIRs serviced by the sleek modern central bathroom. A quality kitchen with stone benches and 900mm stainless steel appliances overlooks the multiple living and dining areas that lead out to the magnificent backyard. Other features include ducted heating, split system cooling, designer lighting, landscaped gardens, possible side access to the rear, flexible floor plan to suit any buyers particular requirements, and double garage with remote and internal access. All this on a large allotment in a prized central location walking distance to all amenities with the added bonus of 10 new retail shops to be built just around the corner.

Description:
An Opulent Home!
Family living in Derrimut has a new benchmark. Combining cutting-edge design and high quality fittings, this 5 bedroom, 3 bathrooms home will take your breath away. Set on a generous size block, this absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family Luxury living in one of Derrimut's finest locations. The interior is instantly eye-catching with its wide entrance flowing throughout the ground level.
The modern beautiful kitchen highlights the home's luxury and detail with a Laminated bench and ample cupboard storage. The very best stainless steel appliances including a 900mm gas cooker, glass splashback and a walk-in pantry.
Comprising of five great sized bedrooms, two large ensuites, dining area and adjoining spacious family room. Entertain family and friends outside with the decked alfresco area. Upstairs there is a great-sized secondary Sitting area which is ideal for a children's retreat. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, internal access from the double garage and beautifully landscaped front and rear gardens.
The home is ideally located in the heart of Derrimut and within close proximity to Balmoral Park, schools, transport, freeway and a choice of shopping precincts. Nothing could be finer
CALL US TODAY FOR FURTHER DETAILS!!

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
Situated in an exclusive pocket of Derrimut a few steps from the heart of all the action proudly stands this Porter Davis beauty. With extensive concreting to the front and rear and with bonus side access this low maintenance property can easily accommodate off street parking for a multitude of vehicles, a boat, caravan or all three whilst still leaving plenty of space for outdoor entertaining. Inside is highlighted by a massive kitchen comprising huge island bench, Caesarstone bench tops, 900mm appliances, glass splashback, overhead cupboards, dishwasher and walk in pantry that overlooks the dining and living area. Other features include a separate theatre or rumpus room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, timber laminate flooring, high ceilings, down lights, 2.25kW solar panel system with 3kW inverter and double remote garage with internal access.

A practical floor plan made to please, with 3 Bedrooms. Open plan Living, dining area adjacent to the masterchef kitchen that offers state of the art stainless steel appliances and plenty of storage.
A long list of inclusions such as soaring high ceilings, ducted heating, air conditioner, outdoor entertaining area, low maintenance gardens,
and garage makes for a very comfortable lifestyle.
Located only a short walk to the shops, schools, childcare and public transport.
Your new home beckons - act now and call today to arrange an inspection

Description:
Family Home In A Growing Estate.
Beautifully presented and kept stands this family home that will cater to all your needs. You will feel the comfort as soon as you walk in, with its delightful open plan living zone and its modern features. A great investment opportunity with solid future growth. This property has great access onto Ballarat Road, Western Ring Road, Deer Park By-Pass & is close to Derrimut Shopping Plaza, the parks and the newly developed golf course.
Comprising:-
3 bedrooms with BIR's, master with full en-suite & WIR, study, open plan living, consisting of well equipped kitchen, family and dining areas, modern bathroom, separate lounge & double remote garage.
Features: Stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, ducted heating & alarm
